data.partBlankContent: The Internet Channel is used to access the Internet. It i_ based o_ the Opera Browser. You ne__ an inte____ connection t_ use th__ channel. data.fullContent: The Internet Channel is used to access the Internet. It is based on the Opera Browser. You need an internet connection to use this channel. From 1 September 2009, the Internet Channel became free to download after an update was released to support Adobe Flash ( a program to watch movies on the internet ). Refunds consisting of a free Virtual Console NES title worth 500 Wii Points were offered by Nintendo to Wii owners who had downloaded it beforehand for the same price.
data.answer: 互联网频道是用来接入互联网的。它基于Opera浏览器。您需要网络接才能使用该频道。从2009年9月1日起，在支持Adobe Flash(一种在互联网上观看电影的程序)的更新发布后，互联网频道开始免费下载。任天堂以同样的价格向事先下载游戏的Wii用户提供价值500个Wii积分的免费虚拟主机NES游戏退款。
